image_metadata.caption: In each class, we generally aimed to have two or three concept questions. For these, we showed a slide with a multiple choice question, typically related to content just discussed in a brief lecture segment. The students responded to this concept question by logging their answers via handheld clickers they brought to class.
image_metadata.image-alt: A multiple choice question is shown on a projector screen. Students use handheld clickers to submit their answers.
